column5: One bedroom condo at the Victorian condominium complex directly on Seawall with a nice view of Gulf and fishing pier. Easy walk across street to beach and pier. Unit has a bedroom with queen size bed. A twin day bed is situated in a cove area for third person. Completely equipped kitchen with fridge, two TVs, outside balcony with chairs and view. Property is gated with security guard. Has two nice swimming pools, two hot tubs, a tennis court, exercise room.
